job.title: Embedded Software Engineer
job.description: puEmbedded Software EngineeruppREQ119091nbspEngineeringppPalo Alto CA United StatesppbrppbrppuAbout Yo LabsuppTechnology has changed daily life in a way no one could have imaginednbspIts made us more productive capable and connectednbspBut it has come at a costnbspWere productive but overwhelmednbspCapable but paralyzed by too many choicesnbspConnected but only if social media countsnbspLiving this way creates a void in our daily livesnbspYo Labs is here to change thatnbspOur team is committed to alleviating the mental load that our modern world has created by putting human connection back into technology and caretaking at the heart of everything we createppbrppstronguWhat Youll Get to DoustrongppYou will work in a small team of device software engineers to build new IoT enabled devices You are expected to be a handson tech lead with demonstrable experience in leading small teams or large complexity components who excel in a dynamic fastmoving and agile environment building high quality high performance and scalable software You will be expected to work equally between design handson development and providing mentorship to other developers within the organization You should have experience leading the development of embedded device software on RTOS or Linux class devices This engineer should have deep experience with all aspects of embedded platform software including boot loaders kernels and several related device drivers This engineering tech lead also requires a solid understanding of embedded security IP networking protocols and will be expected to implement rapid prototypes on a variety of hardware An understanding of factory processes and related security would be a plus You should also have a demonstrable track record of working closely with mobile apps services and PM teams with high quality products that have already launchedpulliBuild robust and scalable embedded device side software with trusted securityliliIndependently plan software milestones and release schedulesliliDesign develop test deploy and maintain device IoT software in the fieldliliCollaborate with other engineering teams PM and UX teamsliliTech Lead may coordinate a small team of engineers while mentoring othersliulpbrppstronguWhat Youll BringustrongppstronguEducation amp ExperienceustrongpulliPreferably gt 10 years experience building embedded software with C C Java PythonliliEvidence of architectural or design influence on embedded platform designliliDemonstrable high quality feature rich product launchesliliTrack record of working successfully with crossfunctional teamsliliProven track record of shipping high quality products in volumeliliExcellent communication and collaboration skillsliliExcellent problem solving and analytical thinking skillsliulpbrppstronguWhat We OfferustrongpulliCompetitive compensation packageliliComprehensive benefitsliliPet InsuranceliliPaid Parental
